summary: This mod adds a restoration shout wich could fortify an npc's health regen, heals an npc for an amount or even resurrect a fallen npc.
descriptionHtml:
Require SKSE.
Please check changelogs for every update changes. Don't forget to endorse if you think this mod is a good addition to your skyrim.

Upon request, I've created a shout that could restore health and even resurrect a dead npc(excl. already dead npc.)

The shout is a targeted shout and only affects one npc at a time with a max distance of 20 feet and uses vanilla words. The following words are used:
Life(Laas; 1st word Aura whisper)
Spirit(Zii; 2nd word Become Ethereal)
Bind(Gron; 3rd word Become Ethereal)
You will learn this shout as you learn one of these vanilla words.

The first word of the shout will increase the npc health regen by 100%(30 sec cd), the second word will heal an npc for 100 points(50 sec cd) and third word will resurrect the targeted dead npc(600 sec cd).
This mod uses the resurrect function in a way that will return the npc' s old equipment rather than only resetting everything. Resurrection may have some weirdness, but it works.

This mod should have little or no bugs and should be compatible with any mod out there. Should you find any bugs or any part of the mod that looks overpowered or underpowered, please report it so I can fix or change it.
author: Jun wei Zhu

Fixed incompatibility with Stamina and magicka shouts as well as any mods modifying player.
